price: 3. Waa wax uu Alle neceb yahay inaad ku hadashaan (oo fartaan dadka) wax aydaan falin.
arabic: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kabura maqtan ʿinda al-lahi an taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūna
